inclusion.criterion: ability to read and write in English
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: normal pregnancy/delivery status without birth complications
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: term birth (+/- 14 days from due date)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: approximately equal numbers of male and female infants
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: recruitment of approximately equal numbers of depressed and nondepressed mothers
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: matching on ethnic composition to the extent possible
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: participants will be seen at 5, 12, and 24 months
inclusion.label: met

notes: A 12 year old girl with Turner syndrome, treating with GH since 6 months ago without estrogen therapy.
